item.name: 1830: The Game of Railroads and Robber Barons
Age of Steam Expansion #4: France and Italy
Alhambra
item.comment: Nice game, simply rules, enjoying.

item.name: Antiquity
item.comment: I like this game very much ! Played a 2-player version.

item.name: Attila
item.comment: A tense wargame about the end of Roman Empire. Nice cards, nice map.

item.name: BANG!
item.comment: Easy and fun ! A great card game for everyone.

item.name: Battaglia Navale
item.comment: It was my first wargame when I was 12. After many games map and fleets become too little for us so with a friend we realized a bigger map, about 2 square meters, and 2 fleets of about 45 wood warships each other than 2 Armoured trains that travelled around the lake. We played it a lot using the same Rules. I remember this game with pleasure, it had very nice components : a map, plastic warships, an Air Squad composed from 3 cardboard fighters and a cardboard atomic bomb. For the 70's the Rules were very good.

item.name: Battle Cry: 150th Civil War Anniversary Edition
Battles of the Hundred Days
item.comment: Not yet played, interesting is the big game scale.

item.name: The Best of Dragon Magazine Games
Buck Rogers: Battle for the 25th Century Game
Bus
item.comment: A great game of management and developing of bus lines. Very intriguing !

item.name: Cortes: Conquest of the Aztec Empire
Doom: Il Gioco da Tavolo – Espansione
Dungeons & Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game
Four Battles of the Ancient World
La Guerra dell'Anello: Battaglie della Terza Era
item.originalname: War of the Ring: Battles of the Third Age

item.name: Heroes of Normandie
item.comment: Played the first scenario at Play 2014 and bought. The game is simple to explain and deep and tense to play. Both newbies and "grognards" can appreciate it.

item.name: HeroQuest
item.comment: Easy and fast role playing game, rich in miniatures and furniture. Very good for everyone, adults and children

item.name: Holy Roman Empire
item.comment: Not yet played, I think can be a good game.

item.name: Hougoumont
item.comment: A very good tactical napoleonic game from "Command" magazine; unfortunately is the only one with this game mechanic.

item.name: I'm the Boss!
item.comment: Very enjoying,great for non-gamers !

item.name: Ideology: The War of Ideas
item.comment: In my opinion is a very nice game, easy to learn and deep to play. At the end of a 4-players game the winner was at 12 points, the other players at 9-8-8, so I think is a balanced game too.

item.name: Kadesh: Mobile Warfare in the Ancient Middle East
Krosmaster: Arena
item.comment: Skirmish game, high quality miniatures, very amusing !

item.name: L'Arme du Nord; the Belgian Campaign
Lightning: North Africa on to Tobruk!
Lords of Waterdeep: Scoundrels of Skullport
Mamoonia
item.comment: Nice fantasy game, nice game mechanic and components, Mamoonia is a one evening game.

item.name: Napoleon in Europe
item.comment: A very nice game.

item.name: Power Grid
item.comment: A planning,bidding and resourse management game; something of Medieval Merchant and 1830. Easy to learn but not too easy to manage. A great game in my opinion !

item.name: The Prince: The Struggle of House Borgia
Princes of the Renaissance
item.comment: Great game that recreate the Renaissance atmosphere, a 3 players game was tense and interesting, I think a 5-6 players game can be most competitive yet!

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Raja: Costruire Palazzi in India
item.originalname: Maharaja: The Game of Palace Building in India
item.comment: Raja is, in my opinion, a very nice game. There is something in this game that remember me “Medieval merchant ”and “El grande” that are 2 of my preferred games. The game is really deep because you must balance your actions between the needs of build and change character and modify the sequence of cities visited by the maharaja to obstacle the opponents and favour yourself , not easy but very intriguing. Really a very good game !

item.name: Risk: Star Wars Original Trilogy Edition
Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
The Sands of War Expansion Kit
Shogun
item.comment: A nice and easy introductory wargame. More interesting than Risk, nice miniatures, big map, is possible to find variants to have a more complex game. I like it as a relaxing game.

item.name: Il Signore degli Anelli: Il Gioco di Carte
item.originalname: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game

item.name: Smithereens: The End of World War II in Europe
Space Hulk: Death Angel – Il Gioco di Carte
item.originalname: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game – Deathwing Space Marine Pack

item.name: Star Wars: Escape From Death Star Game
StarCraft: The Board Game – Brood War Expansion
StarSoldier: Tactical Warfare in the 25th Century
Storm over Arnhem
item.comment: I played some years ago, with a little house variant for the secret disposition of germans at start of game, I remember a furious game that I suppose very close to reality. A great wargame.

item.name: Struggle of Empires
item.comment: Deep and tense, original the alliance system. I played a 7 players game, very enjioing, can be useful a card list for every player during the first game. Another must !

item.name: Super Fantasy: La Notte dei Morti Male
item.originalname: Super Fantasy: Night of the Badly Dead

item.name: Tide of Iron: Days of the Fox
Tide of Iron: Designer Series Vol. 1
Tide of Iron: Fury of the Bear
Il Trono di Spade: Il Gioco da Tavolo Seconda Edizione
item.originalname: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)

item.name: UR
item.comment: Easy rules but not easy to master, a deep game in my opinion. A little gem.

item.name: Vive l'Empereur
item.comment: I played Vl'E and I appreciated this game because has simply rules and is a fast and tense napoleonic game.

item.name: War to Axis: Warfare in Normandy
item.comment: A very nice game on ww2, fast and amusing, very nice maps and counters.The game system is both easy and deep, is a pleasure to play !

item.name: WarCraft: The Board Game Expansion Set
Warhammer Fantasy Battle: Battle For Skull Pass
Warhammer Fantasy Battle: The Island of Blood
Warhammer: Invasion – Il Gioco di Carte
Warrior Knights
item.comment: One of the best games I played ! The only defect: is a long game.

item.name: Warriors & Traders: Middle Ages
item.comment: Played W&T with this expansion ( 6 players ) , at the end of the game we were enthusiastic !

item.name: Web of Power
item.comment: Fast, simple, deep. 20-30 minutes for a game. I like very much ! ;-)

item.name: Der weiße Lotus
item.comment: Fast and furious conquest game, I played it one time and in the opinion of my friends (and in my too)the game was tense and very enjoying. Tons of backstabbing ! Nice map, nice counters, clear rules, quick game. We were 5 players and played it in about 1 hour.

item.name: World of Warcraft: The Boardgame – Shadow of War
World of Warcraft: The Boardgame – The Burning Crusade
Yankees & Rebels
item.comment: I played the 1st day of the battle of Gettysburg and it was an enjoyment to play: easy rules, fast and tense game. I think this game can be interesting for all players because is well balanced between playability and history and allows to focus on the battlefield instead on complicated rules. Another very nice game by Giogames.

item.name: Zombiaki II: Attack on Moscow
item.comment: Enjoying card game.

item.name: Zombicide Box of Dogs Set #6: Dog Companions
Zombicide Box of Zombies Set #5: Zombie Dogz
